title: Nocturnal Conspiracies: Nineteen Dreams From December 1979 to September 1994
description: The best-selling author of "Epileptic" and one of Europeâ€™s leading new generation comics artists invites us to experience nineteen explorative and most imaginative dreams he has experienced. Strange, scary, beautiful, funny and with a sense all their own, these are tales of the inner psyche.
author: David B.
